text: Bombs Bursting in Air and similar phrases could refer to: *"...Bombs Bursting in Air... ", a phrase from the national anthem of the United States, "The Star-Spangled Banner" *"Bombs Bursting in Air", a 1990 episode of the American television series The New Dragnet *Bombs Bursting in Air: The Influence of Air Power on International Relations, a 1939 book by George Fielding Eliot
title: Bombs Bursting in Air
